newsitem.title: USA: Creative to begin $50 mln Sound Blaster campaign.
newsitem.headline: Creative to begin $50 mln Sound Blaster campaign.

text.p: Creative Technology Ltd said Sunday it will launch a $50 million, six-month marketing program to support its Sound Blaster AWE64 audio standard for all current and future PCs
"I want to make the upgrade to AWE64 a must-have for all our current 40 million Sound Blaster users," said W.H. Sim, Creative's chief executive officer.

The company said that Sound Blaster AWE64 would be priced at $99.99. Although targeted primarily at the end user, this marketing program will encompass activities for those developers, OEMs and partners who work closely with Creative, said the company.
In addition to print and advertising campaigns, the company said the promotion effort would include online advertisement, giveaways, and trade show promotions.
The company said that it believes the marketing effort will not have any adverse impact on its financials.
Creative Technology Ltd is a provider of advanced multimedia solutions for personal computers, including sound, graphics, communications and video conferencing products.
